divs: Sighting Detailsi was at home making sure my doors were locked because my husband left to work and sometimes he does not lock the door. when i was checking my back door(glass) i noticed a bright thing in the sky because it was the only thing that stood out. there were no stars out that night. it looked different, not a plane, a star, or helicopter. i decided to grab my digital camera to take pictures and video. the object appeared to be rotating and going up and down with out sound. it seemed to be moving very rapidly left to right, then up and down. i was scared since my husband was not at home, there's a green belt behind my home. i was tired of watching it after an hour. i started watching tv since i couldn't go back to sleep.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around June 24th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Object was bright white, blue and red.
